description:
EatCloud is a triple impact startup that reduces food waste, fights hunger and helps the environment.  
EatCloud helps the food ecosystem (CPGs, supermarkets, convenience stores, catering, digital platforms, etc.) to take advantage of unsold food, avoiding waste. We are rescuing and redistributing surpluses, in the right conditions for human consumption,  through food banks and NPOs to fight hunger massively, acting as a bridge between unsold foods and those who need it most.d them most. 

Using AI, weÂ´re automating the food rescue and redistribution process, converting the costly problem of surluses into a great opportunity to generate economic, social and environmental impact, and generating analytical data that optimize internal processes and generate responsible production and consumption behaviors.
location: America, Europe, and soon Asia and Africa.
name: EatCloud
